messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Rainy days make me feel blue...But the instant it starts to snow,
I’m as happy as can be!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Can any of your Pokémon use that
hidden move to climb cliffs?
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
You really must like snow.After all, if you didn’t, I doubt that
you’d come here so often!
